title: News: Youth Lagoon Announces Details of Sophomore Record
content:
Boise sensation Youth Lagoon has announced details of his sophomore record, the follow up to 2011’s breakthrough LP The Year Of Hibernation.

The psychedelic sounding Wondrous Bughouse will be released 5 March via Fat Possum Records, Check out the tracklisting below as well as the video to Montana, taken from his debut LP.

Through Mind and Back
Mute
Attic Doctor
The Bath
Pelican Man
Dropla
Sleep Paralysis
Third Dystopia
Raspberry Cane
Daisyphobia

Youth Lagoon – Montana from Tyler T Williams on Vimeo.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
